dialog.text: Hi, I think I could find some help from you. The seeker  feels hopeful. The supporter should ask what the seeker need help with.
Oh, hi there. Sure, I'm glad to be able to provide some assistance. Did anything happen?

Yeah, it's complicated, my life is all about making decisions right now. The seeker  feels complicated because of making decisions. The supporter should ask for more details about the seeker's life to get more information.
I'm sorry to hear that. What sort of things are you experiencing now?

It's so difficult. Well, it's about my boyfriend. I found him lying about everything. When we met, he said that he was divorced, but I ended up finding out that he was still legally married. He said that he needed sometimg to make the process, but I really don't know if I could trust him or not. I don't know what to do now... The seeker  feels complicated and difficult because of the boyfriend. The supporter could tell the seeker that she could make the decision by herself. The supporter should also ask the seeker how she would feel after making the decision.
I am so sorry to hear that this has been going on. How does your family and friends feel about it?
beam_texts: I am so sorry to hear that this has been going on. How does your family and friends feel about it?

dialog.text: They don't know. I haven't told them yet. I don't know how to bring it up. The seeker  feels confused and helpless about the situation with her boyfriend. The supporter could tell the seeker that she is not alone and provide some resources to the seeker.
I think it is important that you tell them. They will be your biggest support system and will be able to help you through this.
beam_texts: I think it is important that you tell them. They will be your biggest support system and will be able to help you through this.

dialog.text: I think you're right. I'm just not sure how to bring it up. The seeker  feels confused and frustrated because the seeker's boyfriend lied about his divorce status. The supporter could tell the seeker to talk to friends and family for more supports. The supporter could also suggest the seeker to find a professional help.
I think that you should bring it up by telling them that you suspect that your marriage is in trouble. This way, they will be more supportive than if you had not told them.
beam_texts: I think that you should bring it up by telling them that you suspect that your marriage is in trouble. This way, they will be more supportive than if you had not told them.

dialog.text: That's true. I'm just worried that they'll be disappointed. The seeker  feels worried and stressed because of the relationship with her boyfriend. The supporter could suggest the seeker to tell her family and friends to get more support.
I think they will be more disappointed if you do not bring it up.
beam_texts: I think they will be more disappointed if you do not bring it up.

dialog.text: I agree. I just don't know how to bring it up. The seeker  feels worried and confused about telling the family about the boyfriend's situation. The supporter could suggest the seeker to talk to the boyfriend first and get more information. The supporter could also suggest the seeker to bring up the topic by saying that the seeker suspects the marriage is in trouble.
I think you should just tell them that you have some things you need to talk to them about and you would like to talk to them about your relationship with them.
beam_texts: I think you should just tell them that you have some things you need to talk to them about and you would like to talk to them about your relationship with them.

dialog.text: I think I can do that. I'm just worried that they'll think I'm being dramatic. The seeker  feels worried and confused about the situation. The supporter could suggest the seeker to talk to the family and friends for more support.
I think that they will be more than willing to listen to you and help you.

dialog.text: That's true. I just don't want them to think I'm being dramatic. The seeker  feels worried, confused and stressed about the relationship with her boyfriend. The supporter could suggest the seeker to talk with family and friends for more support.
I think that they will all understand how hard this situation has been for you.

dialog.text: I hope so. The seeker  feels worried and stressed because of the complicated relationship. The supporter could tell the seeker that it is better to tell the truth to the family and find some supports from them.
I hope that everything works out for you.
beam_texts: I hope that everything works out for you.

You're welcome.
